Line17.A9F43: Who are you to demand such a thing? None but those who have dedicated their lives to worship may touch the holy implements!
Line19.BAE4: I am on a solemn task from the Reverend Mother Prava herself! Shall I tell her you are unwilling to fulfill her request?
Line21.A9F43: Oh! P-please forgive me! It is so rare to hear any news from Kyovashad, let alone from the Reverend Mother herself! I am honored!
Line23.A9F43: Here, here! It will need to be consecrated first, of course. Anointed in the blood of sinners. There are deserving brigands skulking in the caves to the east.
VoiceDir19.BAE4: You are attempting a bold faced lie.
VoiceDir21.A9F43: Immediate switch to sycophantic. You don't want your boss to come down on you.
